Get Started

Shu Fai Cheung & Mark Hok Chio Lai

2024-04-12

Source: vignettes/semlrtp.Rmd
semlrtp.Rmd

WORK-IN-PROGRESS

Data 

library(lavaan)
#> This is lavaan 0.6-17
#> lavaan is FREE software! Please report any bugs.
library(semlrtp)
# Use a smaller sample to show the impact of using LRT p-values
set.seed(1234)
data(data_sem16)
mod <-
"
f1 =~ x1 + x2 + x3
f2 =~ x5 + x6 + x7
f3 =~ x9 + x10 + x11
f4 =~ x13 + x14 + x15
f3 ~ f1 + f2
f4 ~ f3
"
fit <- cfa(mod,
           data_sem16,
           group = "group")
fit_nogp <- cfa(mod,
                data_sem16)

LRT p-values 

fit_lrtp <- lrtp(fit)
fit_lrtp
#> 
#> Parameter Estimates:
#> 
#>   Standard errors                             Standard
#>   Information                                 Expected
#>   Information saturated (h1) model          Structured
#> 
#> 
#> Group 1 [gamma]:
#> 
#> Regressions:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f3 ~                                                
#>     f1                0.718    0.269    6.235    0.013
#>     f2                0.765    0.322    6.499    0.011
#>   f4 ~                                                
#>     f3                0.499    0.130   32.074    0.000
#> 
#> Covariances:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f1 ~~                                               
#>     f2                0.116    0.052    8.709    0.003
#> 
#> 
#> Group 2 [alpha]:
#> 
#> Regressions:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f3 ~                                                
#>     f1                0.509    0.239    7.538    0.006
#>     f2               -0.033    0.156    0.036    0.849
#>   f4 ~                                                
#>     f3                0.740    0.268   18.860    0.000
#> 
#> Covariances:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f1 ~~                                               
#>     f2                0.082    0.060   Failed   Failed
#> 
#> NOTE: 'Failed' indicates that LRT p-value is requested but the 
#> likelihood ratio test failed.
fit_lrtp_b <- lrtp(fit,
                   op = "~")
fit_lrtp_b
#> 
#> Parameter Estimates:
#> 
#>   Standard errors                             Standard
#>   Information                                 Expected
#>   Information saturated (h1) model          Structured
#> 
#> 
#> Group 1 [gamma]:
#> 
#> Regressions:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f3 ~                                                
#>     f1                0.718    0.269    6.235    0.013
#>     f2                0.765    0.322    6.499    0.011
#>   f4 ~                                                
#>     f3                0.499    0.130   32.074    0.000
#> 
#> 
#> Group 2 [alpha]:
#> 
#> Regressions:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f3 ~                                                
#>     f1                0.509    0.239    7.538    0.006
#>     f2               -0.033    0.156    0.036    0.849
#>   f4 ~                                                
#>     f3                0.740    0.268   18.860    0.000
fit_nogp_lrtp <- lrtp(fit_nogp)
fit_nogp_lrtp
#> 
#> Parameter Estimates:
#> 
#>   Standard errors                             Standard
#>   Information                                 Expected
#>   Information saturated (h1) model          Structured
#> 
#> Regressions:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f3 ~                                                
#>     f1                0.656    0.191   13.381    0.000
#>     f2                0.347    0.179    4.016    0.045
#>   f4 ~                                                
#>     f3                0.602    0.131   44.155    0.000
#> 
#> Covariances:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f1 ~~                                               
#>     f2                0.099    0.039    9.729    0.002
fit_nogp_lrtp_b <- lrtp(fit_nogp,
                        op = "~")
fit_nogp_lrtp_b
#> 
#> Parameter Estimates:
#> 
#>   Standard errors                             Standard
#>   Information                                 Expected
#>   Information saturated (h1) model          Structured
#> 
#> Regressions:
#>                    Estimate  Std.Err    Chisq     LRTp
#>   f3 ~                                                
#>     f1                0.656    0.191   13.381    0.000
#>     f2                0.347    0.179    4.016    0.045
#>   f4 ~                                                
#>     f3                0.602    0.131   44.155    0.000

Allow error variances

fit_nogp_lrtp_evar <- lrtp(fit_nogp,
                           no_error_variances = FALSE)
fit_nogp_lrtp_evar
#> 
#> Parameter Estimates:
#> 
#>   Standard errors                             Standard
#>   Information                                 Expected
#>   Information saturated (h1) model          Structured
